metadata.title: CVE-2017-11664 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The _WM_SetupMidiEvent function in internal_midi.c:2122 in WildMIDI 0.4.2can cause a denial of service (invalid memory read and application crash)via a crafted mid file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11664` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwildmidi-config - 0.3.8-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
libwildmidi1 - 0.3.8-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
wildmidi - 0.3.8-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wildmidi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.8-2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
